body:
The solution is to create the embedding layer like this:

```
    emb = keras.layers.Embedding(*(embedding_mat.shape),
                                 input_length=SEQ_LEN, name='embed', trainable=False,
                                 embeddings_initializer='zeros')(inp_placeholder)
```

I think using the `weights` argument to initialize the [Embedding ](https://keras.io/layers/embeddings/)layer has been deprecated.
